name: Get to Grandma's
description:
I wish I had more time to finish this, planned out too many features. 

When you start the game you appear on a bike in the road. Travel down the roads (using WASD) and find grandma to win. Be aware of those that wish to hunt you down! 

If you fall off your bike, you must get back on (press space while over bike) or reach grandma's before taking another hit. 

Edit: 10/31/2022 - I posted an update to the game that fixes some of the bugs players encountered. See the "Update 1" zip file.

Github Link: https://github.com/najarvis/Pygame-Halloween-Game-Jam-2022

Contributors:

John Hata - RNJohn#2719
